policies.description: Ensure that the flight status for a reservation is 'available' before booking. If the status is 'available', the flight has not taken off, and available seats and prices are listed.
references: if the status is "available", the flight has not taken off, available seats and prices are listed.

policies.description: Ensure that flights with status 'delayed' or 'on time' are not booked.
references: if the status is "delayed" or "on time", the flight has not taken off, cannot be booked.

policies.description: Ensure that flights with status 'flying' are not booked as the flight has taken off but not landed.
references: if the status is "flying", the flight has taken off but not landed, cannot be booked.
